name: Super Dango
description:
Game Introduction

The rules of the game are dynamic. The rules can help you solve problems，or prevent you reaching the end. According to the rules, all the characters in the game are sometimes your friends and sometimes enemies（so is the real life）

Please think outside the box, to find a way to win.

Game Difficulty

In order to let more people experience the fun of the puzzle game, there will be a lot of interesting easy levels in the game. Of course, the hard level will not be few. I hope everyone could play the satisfactory level.

The game contains a convenient editor, which can easily share your own level to your friends. If you think your level is great, you can also send it to me. If it is really good, I will include it in the game and mark the author. Let more people play your level. (Because of technical problems, creative workshops are not supported at present ，it will be available in the future)

Author Says

Last year, “Baba is you”, an amazing puzzle solving game, came into the market. I was also one of the fans. I cleared the game at the first time. then, I imagined that if I could make a real-time game of the same type, it would be very interesting. It could not only realize many interesting levels, but also reproduce more games, such as Tank War and Snake.

if it can play music, If it can click, If it have storage, the game will be more interesting.
If there is a convenient editor, more people will create and share levels.

With these ideas, I made this game, I hope you can enjoy it.


dango is puzzle
puzzle is funny
funny is more
